QuestData.Title: Swabbing Duty
QuestData.Description: I want the surface of the Riptide t'shine like a star ruby, Swabbie $n. I keep a tight ship around here, and it's swabbies like you that make it happen!$b$bWell, what're y'waitin' for, y'cockle-brained bilgerat? Head updecks and start swabbin'!
QuestData.LogDescription: Pick up a Swabbie's Mop on the deck of the Riptide, then keep the deck clean for 2 minutes.
QuestData.CompletionText: Y'try my patience, swabbie. Yer this close t'gettin' kicked back OUT o' the pirates.
QuestData.RewardText: I heard the most furious mopping sounds from down here, $g mate: wench;. That's EXACTLY what your Captain likes to hear.
